item.title: ðŸ“‹ Jira Integration Guide
item.description: DefectDojo’s Jira integration can be used to push Finding data to one or more Jira Projects. By doing so, you can integrate DefectDojo into your standard development workflow.

item.title: Integrations Guide (Pro)
item.description: DefectDojo Pro’s Integrations let you push your Findings and Finding Groups to ticket tracking systems to easily integrate security remediation with your teams existing development workflow.

item.title: Integrators Tool Reference
item.description: Here are specific instructions detailing how to set up a DefectDojo Integration with a third party Issue Tracker. Azure DevOps Boards Instance Setup Label should be the label that you want to use to identify this integration.

item.title: Troubleshooting Jira errors
item.description: Here are some common issues with the Jira integration, and ways to address them. Unable to setup Jira configuration in DefectDojo due to 404, 401 or 403 errors Jira Cloud:
